item.title: Jesus Saves
item.description: Handout from Greg I’m going to start with the handout Greg sent by email which will be the focus of the lesson. My reactions are indented along the way. Life Connection In a world where various religious groups seek their own interpretations of salvation, and many individuals question its necessity, even the most self-absorbed among us occasionally sense an emptiness, a yearning for something deeper. Most would be relieved to have just one solid answer defining exactly what salvation is.

item.title: 2025-12-21 When Understanding Falls Short
item.description: God will use anyone who surrenders to Him Page 39 starts with an inspirational story of Oseola McCarty who lived a life in servitude to others, only to leave the entirety of her worldly accumulation to help others. Indeed, her story illustrates the main point of the lesson. Truly inspirational. Appearance by an angel The Luke 1:26-30 passage on page 40 tells the Luke version of the birth narrative.
